title: Global Markets Fall After Oil Hits $130 a Barrel
sub_head: Brent crude oil surges to 14-year high
body:
U.S. stock futures and global equity indexes dropped after Russian forces intensified strikes across Ukraine and as the threat of a potential ban on imports of Russian oil helped spur a surge in energy prices.
Futures tied to the Dow Jones Industrial Average, S&P 500 and Nasdaq-100 declined between 1.3% and 1.4%, indicating U.S. markets could fall in Mondayâ€™s trading. The Dow last week recorded its fourth straight week of losses.
